Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Colonization \Col`o*ni*za"tion\, n. [Cf. F. colonisation.] The act of colonizing, or the state of being colonized; the formation of a colony or colonies. [1913 Webster]
The wide continent of America invited colonization. --Bancroft. [1913 Webster]
colonization n : the act of colonizing; the establishment of colonies; "the British colonization of America" [syn: {colonisation}, {settlement}]
